shortcv.p: Xenia Ziouvelou is a Research Officer at the Athens University of Economics and Business in ELTRUN (the e-Business Center) and an external PhD student in the Department of Economics at the Lancaster University, UK. She holds a first degree in Business Administration (American College of Greece, Greece), and an MSc in International Business (Lancaster University, UK). Her research focuses on strategic and micro economic issues in highly competitive marketplaces, specialising in electronic commerce. Since February 2002 she has been working in ELTRUN and since May 2001 she has been pursuing her postgraduate studies sponsored by the Lancaster University. She has worked as a researcher on e-business models and as a Project Manager in the European Commission funded project titled: E-FACTORS: A Thematic Network in E-Business Models (IST-2001-34868). Xenia can be reached by e-mail at xz@eltrun.gr.
